directions: Blend mayonnaise, cilantro, jalapeno pepper, garlic, lime juice, cumin, and salt together in a blender or food processor until smooth. Pour mixture into a bowl, cover the bowl with plastic wrap, and refrigerate until flavors blend, at least 1 hour.
ingredients: 1/2 cup firmly packed fresh cilantro leaves
1 jalapeno, seeds and membrane removed, diced
title: Lick-the-Spoon Cilantro Jalapeno Aioli
